mapper.insert: insert into details(detailsid , ordercode , jiancaiid , num , price , cityid , peihuoid , viewdate ) values(#{detailsid} , #{ordercode} , #{jiancaiid} , #{num} , #{price} , #{cityid} , #{peihuoid} , #{viewdate} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.jiancainame , c.cityname , d.peihuoname from details a , jiancai b , city c , peihuo d where 1=1 and a.jiancaiid = b.jiancaiid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.peihuoid = d.peihuoid order by detailsid desc

select a.* , b.jiancainame , c.cityname , d.peihuoname from details a , jiancai b , city c , peihuo d where 1=1 and a.jiancaiid = b.jiancaiid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.peihuoid = d.peihuoid and detailsid=#{detailsid} order by detailsid desc

select a.* , b.jiancainame , c.cityname , d.peihuoname from details a , jiancai b , city c , peihuo d where 1=1 and a.jiancaiid = b.jiancaiid and a.cityid = c.cityid and a.peihuoid = d.peihuoid
and a.ordercode like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{ordercode}, '%'))
and a.jiancaiid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{jiancaiid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.price like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{price}, '%'))
and a.cityid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{cityid}, '%'))
and a.peihuoid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{peihuoid}, '%'))
and a.viewdate like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{viewdate}, '%'))
